levels.description: Copies an undeployed Operator. If it is a Ranged Operator, can split itself after every <@ba.vup>10</> attacks, automatically deploying a copy on an adjacent tile (lasts <@ba.vup>25</> seconds); if it is a Melee Operator, each attack <$ba.steal>Steals</> <@ba.vup>10</> ATK and DEF from enemies (Caps at<@ba.vup>250</>, resets after copying another Operator)
